name: Penguin Pandemonium
description:
Overview

Hat's are a rarity in penguin society and each penguin tribe wants the hats for themselves. Years ago penguins fought with each other for control of the hats. The Hat Wars lasted for hundreds of years until penguins from each of the tribes made peace and came up with a new way to decide which tribes got the hats. They invented the Pandemonium Games.

You have been chosen as one of the penguins who will compete in the Pandemonium Games to claim a hat for your tribe. You need to work together with your team to get the hat to your goal and to stop the other team from getting the hat to their goal. You had better be good at using skis.

Goal

Get the hat into the goal of your color. Shoot snowballs to impede the other team and to steal the hat.

Controls

- WASD or Arrows to move.

- Shift for quick turns.

- Left Click or Space to throw snowballs.

- Move your mouse to aim your snowballs.

Winning

  The team with the most points at the end of the time wins the

  game and the hat.

Good Luck. Have Fun. Your tribe is counting on you.

Note

There is more chaos when the difficulty is higher.

Using a mouse is highly recommended.
